string-array.name: event_info_array
string-array.item: Click on the object when it appears.
Click on the arrow pointing in the same direction as the center arrow.\nIgnore all the others.
Click on the outer arrow pointing in the same direction as the center arrow.

You are the blue square.

You can move 1 square at time vertically or horizontally. (You cannot move diagonally)

 The goal is to chase after the red square for 30s or till you catch them.

Click on yes if:
 - The top boxes number is even.
 - The bottom boxes letter is a vowel.

Otherwise click no.
Tap space above as many times as possible within 5 seconds.
Press yes if the card has been shown before, no if it has not. \nThere will twenty cards
Recreate the shown pattern as fast as you can.\nFor each pattern you can make 3 errors.
If the text colour of the top word matches the word colour below, press Match.\nIf not press No Match.

Answer the questions as truthfully as possible.

For the sleep durations please answer in the format HH:mm or HH.mm.

 For the remaining questions give a rating from 0 to 5. With 5 Being the highest.
